document.full_text: the philadelphia phillies, a 2011 title favorite, will launch their campaign without closer brad lidge, who is going on the disabled list due to shoulder pain, major league baseball's website mlb.com said friday.
document.title: phillies closer brad lidge to go on disabled list
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia phillies, a 2011 title favorite, will launch their campaign without closer brad lidge, who is going on the disabled list due to shoulder pain, major league baseball's website mlb.com said friday.
